tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    viewer_id INT,
    recommended_content_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (viewer_id) REFERENCES viewer_behavior(viewer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (recommended_content_id) REFERENCES content(content_id)
);

CREATE TABLE viewer_demographics (
  viewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE content_ratings (
  content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  rating FLOAT,
  genre VARCHAR(50),
  release_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE viewer_preferences (
  viewer_id INT,
  content_id INT,
  rating FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (viewer_id) REFERENCES viewer_demographics(viewer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES content_ratings(content_id)
)

CREATE TABLE viewer_activity (
  viewer_id INT,
  content_id INT,
  date_viewed TIMESTAMP,
  duration_minutes INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (viewer_id) REFERENCES viewer_demographics(viewer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES content_ratings(content_id)
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
 interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 viewer_id INT,
 video_id INT,
 interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
 feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 viewer_id INT,
 video_id INT,
 feedback_type VARCHAR(20),
 comment TEXT
);
